com.vmware.vapi.saml.exception

Class SsoException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.vmware.vapi.saml.exception.SsoException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvalidTokenException

    public abstract class SsoException
extends Exception
    Class representing a general SSO exception. SsoException should be sub-classed by more specialized exceptions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
